profile.profileName: [UPDATE National September 11th Memorial & Museum, New York, NY, USA] Memorial museum and archive
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for use as an archive for images, documents, video and oral history. It is intended for use by the National September 11th Memorial & Museum (http://www.national911memorial.org/)

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of item description. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a dropdown with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Provenance
label.description: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity

label.name: Rights notes
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Donor opt-in to share with Voices of September 11th
Numbers
label.description: A log of any numbers associated with a lot.

label.name: Dimensions
label.description: Physical dimensions of object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.description: Hold-over from old CA system

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.

label.name: Inner chamber audio clip time stamp
Family/Friend State
label.description: The state of residence of the Family/Friend. Enter the 2 digit postal code.

label.name: Coverage
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

label.name: Format
label.description: The file format or physical medium or dimensions of the resource.

label.name: Language
label.description: A language of the resource.

label.name: Relation
label.description: A related resource.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Source
label.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

label.name: Creator
label.description: The creator of the described resource.

label.name: Publisher
label.description: The publisher of the described resource.

label.name: Contributor
label.description: A contributor to the described resource.

label.name: Interviewer

label.description: The interviewee in the described resource.
